A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's a mess. This movie completely destroys everything built in the original trilogy it even destroys episode seven.\nI don't hate it\, it is just a bad story\, a bad executed movie. I didn't like the direction at all\, there were a few good moments but the story line was so messy.\nThat's is\, it's a bad movie\, an small enjoyable movie for those that never seen Star Wars and just walked in to se entertainment\, for the Star Wars fans is opposite of The Gorce Awakens\, nothing for the fans.
